articles.description: THE WORLD Health Organisation has issued a stark warning after research in China revealed that a new strain of swine flu could potentially bring about a new pandemic.

articles.title: Oral hygiene and severity of COVID-19 – the connection - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Their study titled, “Could there be a link between oral hygiene and the severity of SARS-CoV-2 infections?” was published in the latest issue of the journal British Dental Journal.
articles.content: British researchers have found a link between poor oral hygiene and severity of COVID-19 disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) infection. The study from resea… [+4906 chars]
